projects-view-no-workspace-content:
A workspace is required in order to use the project feature.
[Open Workspace…](command:workbench.action.openWorkspace)
[Save Workspace…](command:workbench.action.saveWorkspaceAs)
projects-view-no-project-content:
No projects found in current workspace.
[New Project…](command:projects.newProject)
[Open Project…](command:projects.openProject)
